channel.title: [PI] My client wont work on my xp comp but will on my w7[PI]
channel.description:
Okay ive made a pi on my windows 7 laptop, it runs perfectly but since it has broke i had to buy a tempory xp and it will not run it just says (this is on the client - the source runs fine)
The system cannot find the path specified The system cannot find the path specified press any key to continue....
This is the code
[code=java] @echo off title Ziobotic Pkz cd ./Files "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32 pause [/code]

item.title: [PI] My client wont work on my xp comp but will on my w7[PI]

item.title: [PI] My client wont work on my xp comp but will on my w7[PI]
item.dc:creator: @abtekk abtekk
item.description:
@abtekk wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I, post:1, topic:404709”]@echo off cd ./Files "C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32 pause???[/quote]

That’s what I suggested.

item.title: [PI] My client wont work on my xp comp but will on my w7[PI]
item.dc:creator: @abtekk abtekk
item.description:
@abtekk wrote:

@echo off
start javaw -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui
exit

Try this. Lol.

item.description:
@no1toldme2 wrote:

try, @echo off title Project Insanity java -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server start Run-Server.bat exit It might not work cuz ur comp is xp. but…

Okay ive made a pi on my windows 7 laptop, it runs perfectly but since it has broke i had to buy a tempory xp and it will not run it just says (this is on the client - the source runs fine)

The system cannot find the path specified

title Ziobotic Pkz
cd ./Files
"C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m 
Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32
